Access Name.Description: This attribute is used to identify the line by using unique access name.
Access Name.Name: Access Name

Add/Replace/Delete.Description: The ADD/Delete/Replace modifiers are used in a definition to Add/Delete/Replace an attribute to the Definition.
Add/Replace/Delete.Name: Add/Replace/Delete

Belongs To.Description: This attribute exports the complete object hierarchy associated with the line, when its value is Yes. The default value is No.
Belongs To.Name: Belongs To

Border.Description: Specifies the border for the line.
Border.Name: Border

Combine.Description: This attribute is to sum up all the repeated fields.
Combine.Name: Combine

DMPMode.Description: This is available in Form, Part, Line, Field and it is used only in dot matrix mode of printing to set the style.
DMPMode.Name: DMPMode

Empty.Description: This attribute removes the line from the Part based on condition.
Empty.Name: Empty

Excel Add Row.Description: This attribute is used to insert a row in Excel sheet based on a condition.
Excel Add Row.Name: Excel Add Row

Explode.Description: Explodes a part from the line based on the condition specified.
Explode.Name: Explode

Field.Description: It is used to specify the field name in this line.

Meta.Aliases: Field, Fields, Left Field, Left Fields

Field.Name: Field

Fixed.Description: This attribute helps to skip the line such that the cursor will not positioned on it.
Fixed.Name: Fixed

Full Object.Description: This attribute exports the object storages associated with the line, including UDFs when its value is Yes. The default value is No.
Full Object.Name: Full Object

Height.Description: Specifies the height of the line.
Height.Name: Height

Help.Description: Specifies the Index / Id of the help file for help.
Help.Name: Help

Indent.Description: This attribute specifies the space to be left from the Left margin before the contents of the line begin.
Indent.Name: Indent

Invisible.Description: It specifies whetther the line is to be visible or not.
Invisible.Name: Invisible

JSONTag.Description: To specify the tag name for the line in the exported JSON/XML file. If not specified, the tag name for the line doesn't appear in the output.
JSONTag.Name: JSONTag

Key.Description: A key definition can be used by the Line definition to initiate the action as defined in the key definition by the Action attribute.
Key.Name: Key

Line.Description: To define another line under a line.  If this attribute is specified the attributes Fields / Right Fields cannot be specified simultaneously.

Meta.Aliases: Line, Lines, Top Line, Top Lines

Line.Name: Line

Local.Description: The Local attribute is used in the context of the definition to set local value within the scope of that definition only.
Local.Name: Local

Local Formula.Description: This is used to specify a local formula within the Line.
Local Formula.Name: Local Formula

Next Page.Description: Specifies when the Line is printed in the next page in Print mode.
Next Page.Name: Next Page

No Cursor.Description: This attribute is used to disallow the cursor on the line when in create or alter mode.   The default value of this attribute is set to Yes.
No Cursor.Name: No Cursor

On.Description: ON keyword is used to specify a list of Actions to be executed on the occurance of an Event.
On.Name: On

Option.Description: Option is an attribute which can be used by various definitions, to provide a conditional result in a program.
Option.Name: Option

Page Break.Description: The attribute Page Break in a line is used to specify closing page breaks and opening pagebreaks in case of horizontal page breaks. Used mostly in case of multicolumn reports.
Page Break.Name: Page Break

Pre Printed.Description: Specifies whether the static text will be preprinted for the printing.
Pre Printed.Name: Pre Printed

Pre Printed Border.Description: Specifies whether the border for the line will be preprinted for the printing.
Pre Printed Border.Name: Pre Printed Border

Preaccept Object Map.Description: This attribute is used to call object map before the line accept.
Preaccept Object Map.Name: Preaccept Object Map

Remove.Description: This attribute removes the line from the Interface.
Remove.Name: Remove

Repeat.Description: Repeats the field with the specified collection. If collection is not specified and no SET attribute is used field is repeated on reports number of columns in case of columner report.
Repeat.Name: Repeat

Right Field.Description: The Fields are aligned to the right of the Line.
Right Field.Name: Right Field

Select.Description: This attribute indicates that the line (or lines within this line) is selectable or not.
Select.Name: Select

Set.Description: This is used to specify the Repeat for fields in absence of Collection, system will uses this value and create as many columns.
Set.Name: Set

Skip Rows.Description: This attribute used Skip Rows in excel export.
Skip Rows.Name: Skip Rows

Stripe.Description: This attribute enables (Yes) /disables (No) Stripes for the Line to improve readability. By default it'll be set as Yes and specific format of data will have Stripes enabled. The behavior can be overridden by usage of same attribute in the children (Part, Line).
Stripe.Name: Stripe

Switch.Description: 'Switch' attribute is similar to the Option attribute but reduces code complexity and improves the performance. The Switch are grouped using a label Once a condition is satisfied from one group, switch won't  check further conditions from the same group.  It will evaluate the conditions from the other groups specified, if any.
Switch.Name: Switch

Use.Description: The USE keyword is used in a definition to reuse an existing definition.
Use.Name: Use

XMLAttr.Description: Specifies the Atrribute and attribute value for the xml tag.
XMLAttr.Name: XMLAttr
